title: [K-12] Instructional Design Scenarios for English Curriculum Reform and Improving Teacher Awareness

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English communication skills and general understanding of curriculum changes
context.additional_context: Blended instruction design reflecting changes in teacher perceptions, collecting and analyzing teacher feedback through semi-structured interviews

learning_goals: Teachers can clearly explain at least three core elements of curriculum reform.
Learners can improve their English communication skills by 20% in a blended environment.
Teachers can improve their teaching methods in at least two ways based on semi-structured interview results.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
